================================-

**Government Tender Announcement: Recipient/Contribution Agreement Audit Services**

**Reference Number:** P2400105

**Publication Date:** August 4, 2023

**Closing Date:** September 5, 2023, 2:30 PM EDT

The Government of Canada, through Women and Gender Equality Canada, invites applications for the provision of third-party services to conduct recipient/contribution agreement audits under the PASS-SA Stream 8 agreement. This requirement is for audit services to support the department's risk management strategies.

**Scope of Work:**

The contractor will provide support to the Manager of the Center of Expertise - Internal Controls on Grants and Contributions Management for four to six (4-6) selected Contribution Agreements financial audits per year. The audit services will be conducted through the Professional Audit Support Services (PASS) Supply Arrangement method of supply, with the applicable resource categories at the Senior level.

**Security Requirements:**

* Company minimum security level required: Protected B
* Resource minimum security level required: Protected B

**Applicable Trade Agreements:**

The service contractor must comply with the following international trade agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement (CColFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement (CHFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement (CPanFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)

**Notice and Contact Information:**

* Contact Person: Kevin Rodrigues
* Email: FEGC.Contrats-Contracts.WAGE@fegc-wage.gc.ca
* Phone: (343) 552-6182

**Bidding Information:**

The bidding opportunity is now closed. The proposal submission deadline was September 5, 2023. A list of invited suppliers has been provided to registered bidders. For further information, please contact the contact person listed above.

Please note that this tender has expired and is no longer open for new bids. [1] [2]
